entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
